```{r}
library(readr)
transcriptData <- read_csv("https://raw.githubusercontent.com/tpemartin/github-data/master/transcript100_102.csv",
                  col_types = cols(
                    學期成績="n"
                  ))

totalCredits<-function(x){
  transcriptData[transcriptData$學號==x,]->subsample 
  subsample %>%
    mutate(
      及格=(學期成績>=60)
    ) %>%
    summarise(
      學號=學號[1],
      總修習學分數=sum(學分數),
      總實得學分數=sum(學分數[及格])
    )  
}
```
